definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Powdery mildew is a global disease for the cereal crop.
sentences.chinese: 白粉病是禾穀類作物的全球性病害。

sentences.english: First, bleach should be referred to as full-strength household bleach.
sentences.chinese: 首先，應該濃縮的家用漂白粉。

sentences.english: He dug into the can and measured out a small spoonful of the powder .
sentences.chinese: 他伸手到罐頭裏舀出一小調羹白粉。

sentences.english: This soft, highly absorbent powder is made from the finest grade of natural cornstarch.
sentences.chinese: 這種軟，高度吸收粉末是由最優秀的品位自然太白粉。

sentences.english: Simple, buy white grooming chalk and sprinkle it into the coat once a week or as needed.
sentences.chinese: 簡單，買白粉筆培育和潑到大衣每週一次或視需要。

sentences.english: The result showed that hiding power and whiteness of modified titanium dioxide were increased.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，改性過的鈦白粉遮蓋率和白度有顯著增大。

sentences.english: Wheat powdery mildew is one of wheat main diseases.
sentences.chinese: 小麥白粉病是小麥的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: Tigress in a red jacket, her face powdered and rouged, followed him with her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 虎妞穿着紅襖，臉上抹着白粉與胭脂，眼睛溜着他。

sentences.english: Two other men who sold tainted protein powder, Zhang Yanzhang and Xue Jianzhong, were sentenced to prison for life, the state-run news agency, Xinhua, reported.
sentences.chinese: 出售有毒蛋白粉的張豔章和薛建忠被判無期徒刑。

sentences.english: The white-washed wall is brilliant against the dark-blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 刷過白粉的牆在深藍色天空的襯托下泛着亮光。

sentences.english: Infection rates plummeted when they started washing their hands with chloride of lime when they entered the ward.
sentences.chinese: 當他們進入病房開始用漂白粉洗手時，感染率下降樂。

sentences.english: It reports the condition of hypha protein powder as new type feed resource.
sentences.chinese: 報告了菌絲蛋白粉作爲新型飼料資源的情況。

sentences.english: Wheat seed-treated With triadimefon is one of the most important measures to control powdery mildew of Wheat.
sentences.chinese: 粉鏽寧拌種是小麥白粉病應急防治的關鍵技術之一。

sentences.english: You don't need four scoops of whey powder to get that amount of protein.
sentences.chinese: 沒有必要喫四大勺的乳清蛋白粉，那麼多的蛋白。

sentences.english: Fig. 3. Effect of temperature on the conidium germination of powdery mildew fungi in cucurbits.
sentences.chinese: 溫度對於瓜類白粉病菌孢子發芽的影響。

sentences.english: A brief review on the development of wheat germplasm with introduced powdery mildew and scab resistance from Haynaldia villosa Sch.
sentences.chinese: 導入白粉病和赤黴病抗性的小麥種質的研究進展。
